clues.1: A figure often associated with strength and far-reaching journeys
clues.2: His name is derived from a term meaning 'glory of Hera'
clues.3: Known for a series of feats known as 'labors'
clues.4: His life was marked by both great achievement and personal tragedy
clues.5: Contrasts with a figure known for his cunning and trickery
clues.6: His influence can be seen in various works of literature and film
